Item ID13369

The Shayzien helm (3) is a helmet that requires 20 Defence to equip, and is part of the Shayzien armour (tier 3) set. In order to receive the armour, players must have at least 80% Shayzien favour.

It is dropped by the tier 3 soldier at the Combat Ring in the Shayzien Encampment.

The '''Shayzien helm (3)''' is a helmet that requires 20 [[Defence]] to equip, and is part of the [[Shayzien armour (tier 3)]] set. In order to receive the armour, players must have at least 80% [[Shayzien]] [[favour]].

It is dropped by the [[Soldier (tier 3)|tier 3 soldier]] at the [[Combat Ring (Shayzien)|Combat Ring]] in the [[Shayzien Encampment]].
